rounds.response:
With 9♥ 8♥ on a J♦ Q♣ 3♦ flop I have an open-ended straight draw (10-7 gives me the nuts) and a weak back-door heart draw, but no pair yet. Facing a small 20-chip bet into a 60-chip pot, I’m getting 3:1 on a call and I still have 980 chips behind. This is a clear call in position with my equity and implied odds if I hit the turn.

[Call]
